name.baseName: transport, freight, lorry 16-32 metric ton, unregulated
运输，货运，货车，16-32 公吨，无管制

dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Medium-duty truck transport; goods movement by medium truck; 16-32 ton freight transport by lorry; unregulated trucking; lorry freight, 16-32 t
Medium-duty truck transport; goods movement by medium truck; 16-32 ton freight transport by lorry; unregulated trucking; lorry freight, 16-32 t
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Transport, freight, by lorry with a carrying capacity of 16-32 metric tons, unregulated signifies a process of moving goods using a medium-sized truck without specific regulations governing emissions or operations, detailing aspects such as the processing level it's at (transport), technical details about the vehicle used (lorry with 16-32 metric ton capacity), standard compliance (unregulated), and the location of availability relative to consumers or manufacturers.
运输, 货运, 16-32公吨载重卡车, 未受规管表示使用一种中型卡车移动货物的过程，该车无特定排放或运营法规的规管，详细说明了其处理水平（运输）、所使用车辆的技术细节（16-32公吨载重卡车）、标准符合性（未受规管）以及与消费者或制造商相对的可用位置。
